resources.string:
Memory Game Rules
 1. Enter your name, press Start
 2. Enter a valid url, press Fetch
 3. Wait for 20 images to be downloaded
 4. Pick any 6 images to be used in the game
 5. Select any 2 images to see if they match
 6. Continue selecting until all images are matched
 7. View your timing in the results page

 Good Luck!
Download completed for 20 out of 20 images!
Error! Please enter a correct URL.
